content.description: This route starts halfway up the boulder with an obvious double hand start. Your feet start spread as well. Your left hand has to spread out wide to the sidepull, then your feet match, and then your left foot goes out to a slanted ledge. Your right hand goes up to a slopey crimp, and then a dyno to a crimpy ledge allows the climber to top out the route. The crux is the dyno for most, although there is a static way to complete the boulder - with an extra crimp. In general, this route is well-protected, but the spotters have to help during the topout.
content.location: The route is found on the main face of the overhang on the backside of the main Friendship Boulder. It's to the right of Stonefish and starts somewhat in the middle of the boulder.

content.description: On the backside of the Friendship Boulder, this route traverses to the right on crappy crimps and bad jugs to an awkward finish. It is a good to climb for beginners and people who need great feet, but it is not much to shake a stick at.
content.location: On the backside of the Friendship Boulder, the start is two obvious crimps and then moves out left, look high for the rest of the holds. Bring a brush, and lower those expectations.

content.description: Climb very bad slopers up to an easy two move finish with the crux at the second move.
content.location:
Just to the left of the

Friendship Traverse

, start to the bottom of the first sloper rail on two solid jugs.

content.description: This is a solid route with a really cool, sidepull move. It requires tons of body tension. There are a couple spots that are super chalked up here, so a brush could be cool just to get a little of the grit back.
content.location:
This is to the right of

Massive Aggressive

. The start holds are insanely chalked up but decent jugs, moving out right to the next hold. Finish to the right of

Massive Aggressive

as well.

content.description: Starting on the same holds as High Metabolism, this climb goes up and right on painful pockets to an awkward top out.
content.location:
This ascends the right edge of the Friendship Boulder. It uses the same start as

High Metabolism

but goes out right.

content.description: This is the leftmost route on the front of the Friendship Boulder. Do an easy, easy, easy traverse across some super huge jugs, topping out before the boulder even tops out. It is recommended for first timers and bored friends.
content.protection: Bring 1 pad or no pads, it's really easy.
